text: Jiří Mikšík (born 2 January 1952) is a Czech former cyclist. He competed in the team pursuit event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Czechoslovakia Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Brno
title: Jiří Mikšík
